trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Riott seems eager to share the customs of Tomra.
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_TODO_00<tab>Slay Scree gnomes and obtain gnome soulstones.
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the gnome soulstones to Riott.
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_TODO_02<tab>Use the bottles of Tomran stonebrew on Zigutt's statue.
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Riott.

TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_000<tab>Lali-ho! Well, dent my helm with a knocker's arse! We've got ourselves a visitor─a <var 09 E948 ((stranger)) ((stranger)) ((strange dwarf)) ((stranger)) ((stranger)) ((stranger)) ((stranger)) ((stranger)) /var> from a strange land!
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_001<tab>If I'm to welcome you properly to Tomra, then I'd best be teachin' you our ways, eh? And that starts with payin' respects to Zigutt's statue!

TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_002<tab>...Ah, you wouldn't know your Riotts from your Ronitts, would you? The “Zigutt” I'm referrin' to is one of our ancestral chiefs─the mightiest warrior in Tholl history! You remember that name, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.

TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_004<tab>Now, first things first, we need to prepare the offering. That involves you bringin' me a couple of soulstones from them rock-headed gnomes out in Scree. Try not to get flattened, eh?
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_005<tab>First off, we need two soulstones! You've got to take 'em from Scree gnomes, and let me tell you: they ain't goin' to cooperate!
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_010<tab>Let's have them soulstones, then!
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_011<tab>Now, I'll just get my hammer out here and...<crunch>...ever so delicately...<crack>...grind these into powder!
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_012<tab>And there we have it! Some lovely bottles of stonebrew, seasoned with a sprinkling of gnomish soulstone!
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_013<tab>It's the soulstone what puts the “stone” in the brew. I mean, how else do you expect a statue to drink it!?
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_014<tab>Now for the ceremonial bit. You take these bottles, and empty 'em onto the four sides of Zigutt's statue over there. Every last drop, mind you!
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_015<tab>What are you waitin' for? Zigutt must be as parched as a squid in the desert after standin' in that square day after day!
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>As you pour the stonebrew onto the base of the statue, you almost believe you see a smile flickering across its impassive face...
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_030<tab>Aye, nicely done, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, nicely done!

TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_031<tab>You may have noticed, but we Tholls like a drink or two. And seein' the great Zigutt unable to hoist a tankard on account of him bein' a stone statue brings a tear to the eye. And so we honor his memory with the brew he loved best.

TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_032<tab>He was chief of the Tholl during the coming of the Flood─a true dwarf among dwarves! It was him what ousted that bastard Warrior of Light, and brought our people together in a time when division meant death!
TEXT_LUCKZI019_03555_RIOTT_000_033<tab>Aye, we wouldn't be here now if it weren't for Zigutt. And I thank you for showin' him the proper respect!
